# Mighty Cleaving (MagWpnSpcAb)
## Overview
A* mighty cleaving* weapon allows a wielder using the [[Cleave (Feat)|Cleave]] feat to make one additional attack if the first attack hits, as long as the next foe is adjacent to the first and also within reach. This additional attack cannot be against the first foe. Only melee weapons can be *mighty cleaving* weapons.

Moderate evocation; CL 8th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Divine Power (Spell)|divine power]]*; Price +1 bonus.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 471
